books.name: The Sun Is Also A Star
Aristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe
Ready Player One, Ernest Cline
books.review: Favorite book of all time. It's the first 500+ page book I've ever read non stop for 12 hours straight. I couldn't put it down! What makes it interesting is, Ready Player One is also a movie (Steven Spielberg!) and this is also the first time I consumed the same content in different formats.

books.name: Miss peregrine's home for peculiar children, Ransom Riggs
books.review: I _read_ this is an audiobook. It took me all weekend to get throguh the 9 hours, but this was the first time I sat through an audiobook.
